name: 'Ophelia' Pendant Lamp
description:
Like all of the pendants in the Medusae Collection, the name Obelia is taken from the Greek word origins of jellyfish classifications. 

Our Ophelia also reminds us of Shakespeare's beautiful young noblewoman with a dainty, slender figure and long flowing hair.

This lovely light also possesses a floating and ethereal beauty...

Dimensions

13"dia x 36" H

Materials:

gloss white powder coated aluminum 
velum finish polyester mylar

Packaged flat, Ophelia is simple to assemble by connecting intricately cut mylar pieces that comprise each design. 

Uses standard A19 bulb, 60 watt max

Made with care in Los Angeles, California.

Ships in 4-6 weeks

Hardwire; professional installation recommended.

name: 'Medusa' Pendant Lamp
description:
Bearing little resemblance to its namesake, the Gorgon Medusa of Greek mythology, this diaphanous beauty will delight with its glowing petals and luminous tendrils.

Dimensions

Materials:

gloss white powder coated aluminum 
velum finish polyester mylar

Packaged flat, Medusa is simple to assemble by connecting intricately cut mylar pieces that comprise each design.
